tasks.title: Initial commit of jade-monolith scaffolding
tasks.description: Commit .gitmodules, packages/, scripts/, CLAUDE.md, .claude/ rules and tasks. Push to jadecli/jade-monolith on GitHub.

tasks.title: Add jade-monolith to ~/.jade/projects.json
tasks.description: Add jade-monolith entry with staging_branch: pre-main to the ecosystem registry.

tasks.title: Review and validate claude-objects pre-main state
tasks.description: Verify pre-main branch is clean, all merged PR work is present, no regressions. Run ruff check and ty if configured. No open PRs remain.

tasks.title: Review and validate dotfiles pre-main state
tasks.description: Verify pre-main branch is clean. Open issues: #4 (chezmoi external sources), #5 (starship prompt), #6 (gh-status function). Assess which are worth implementing vs closing.

tasks.title: Merge jade-claude-settings PR #14 (commitlint + husky)
tasks.description: PR #14 adds commitlint and husky for commit validation. Base: main, head: pre-main. Review, resolve any conflicts, merge into pre-main. Related issue: #15.

tasks.title: Triage jade-claude-settings open issues #3-#5
tasks.description: Issue #3 (update .wslconfig), #4 (configure Docker MCP), #5 (run validation script). These may already be completed from the Win11 upgrade session. Close if done, update if still relevant.

tasks.title: Triage jade-cli open issues #11-#14
tasks.description: Issue #11 (Phase 1 improvements), #12 (optimization plans docs), #13 (jade index subcommands), #14 (recovered worktree work). Assess which are still relevant after PR merges. Close completed, update remaining.

tasks.title: Review jade-cli pre-main integration state
tasks.description: After PR #7 merge (superset of #3, #4, #10), verify pre-main has all expected features. Run npm test, check TypeScript compilation. Confirm React Ink UI works.

tasks.title: Triage jade-dev-assist open issues #11-#13
tasks.description: Issue #11 (swarm task discovery), #12 (8 slash commands), #13 (extract task utils). PRs #5 and #9 were merged. Assess which issues are now complete or partially addressed.

tasks.title: Review jade-dev-assist pre-main integration state
tasks.description: After PRs #5 and #9 merge (23 tests passing), verify pre-main has all expected features. Run npm test. Check scanner, scorer, presenter, dispatcher modules.

tasks.title: Review and validate jade-docker pre-main state
tasks.description: Verify pre-main branch is clean with Docker configs present. No open PRs or issues remain.

tasks.title: Triage jade-ecosystem-assist open issues #2-#4, #12
tasks.description: Issue #2 (submodule sync workflow), #3 (context generation script), #4 (health check aggregator), #12 (jadecli-codespaces patterns). Assess relevance given the monolith approach.

tasks.title: Assess jade-ide PRs #2 and #3
tasks.description: PR #2 (e2e smoke test, base: main) and PR #3 (search bridge improvements, base: main). PR #3 couldn't be retargeted due to duplicate head/base. Determine if these can be merged to pre-main or need closing. Related issues: #5, #6, #7.

tasks.title: Triage jade-index open issues #9-#14
tasks.description: Issue #9 (Neon Merkle tree), #10 (v1 VRAM-aware), #11 (cross-project search), #12 (Neon Auth JWT), #13 (Neon CLI), #14 (NeonProjectManager). These represent the full Neon integration roadmap. Assess priority and feasibility.

tasks.title: Review jade-index pre-main after cherry-pick
tasks.description: Cherry-picked indexer.py + 2 test files from PR #7. Verify pre-main builds, ruff check passes, existing tests pass. Confirm VRAM-aware batch sizing works.

tasks.title: Triage jade-swarm open issues #5-#7
tasks.description: Issue #5 (Neon PostgreSQL infra), #6 (week1 test infra), #7 (dispatcher integration + Merkle RFC). Assess which are relevant to the archive state vs future work.

tasks.title: Triage jadecli-codespaces open issues #9-#12
tasks.description: Issue #9 (doc embeddings + vector search), #10 (resolve ruff errors), #11-#12 (Jade IDE research scaffolding â€” duplicates?). Determine which to keep, close duplicates.

tasks.title: Assess jadecli-infra issue #6 (e2e smoke test)
tasks.description: Issue #6 requests an end-to-end smoke test script. Assess if this is worth implementing for the archive state or should be deferred.

tasks.title: Close jadecli-roadmap tracking issue #13
tasks.description: Issue #13 was the master tracking issue for resolving 11 conflicting PRs before jade-monolith. All 11 are now resolved. Close with summary comment.

tasks.title: Triage jadecli-roadmap open issues #9-#12
tasks.description: Issue #9 (health check report), #10 (ADR-0008 orchestrator), #11 (code quality plan), #12 (integration test suite). These are documentation tasks. Assess which are still relevant.

tasks.title: Triage jadeflow-dev-scaffold open issues #1-#2
tasks.description: Issue #1 (Anthropic/MCP ecosystem research), #2 (scaffold governance). Assess relevance to the monolith archive approach.
